data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon affecting the coast of Guangdong will moderate gradually today and tomorrow. The weather will be mainly fine over the region. It will still be cool in the morning. Daytime temperatures will rise slightly, and it will be dry during the day. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large over inland areas. An easterly airstream will affect the coast of southern China gradually on New Year's Eve, it will be cloudier over the region. A surge of the northeast monsoon is expected to reach the coastal areas at night on New Year's Day, winds will strengthen from the north over the region. Temperatures will fall appreciably and it will become cold in the following couple of days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251229","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine. Cool in the morning, visibility relatively low in some areas.
